Choices for election years and provinces

Source: R/election-data-helpers.R
election_dates.Rd

Choices for election years and provinces

election_dates()

election_years()

election_provinces()

Examples

election_dates()
#>  [1] "1867-08-07" "1872-07-20" "1874-01-22" "1878-09-17" "1882-06-20"
#>  [6] "1887-02-22" "1891-03-05" "1896-06-23" "1900-11-07" "1904-11-03"
#> [11] "1908-10-26" "1911-09-21" "1917-12-17" "1921-12-06" "1925-10-29"
#> [16] "1926-09-14" "1930-07-28" "1935-10-14" "1940-03-26" "1945-06-11"
#> [21] "1949-06-27" "1953-08-10" "1957-06-10" "1958-03-31" "1962-06-18"
#> [26] "1963-04-08" "1965-11-08" "1968-06-25" "1972-10-30" "1974-07-08"
#> [31] "1979-05-22" "1980-02-18" "1984-09-04" "1988-11-21" "1993-10-25"
#> [36] "1997-06-02" "2000-11-27" "2004-06-28" "2006-01-23" "2008-10-14"
#> [41] "2011-05-02" "2015-10-19" "2019-10-21"
election_years()
#>  [1] 1867 1872 1874 1878 1882 1887 1891 1896 1900 1904 1908 1911 1917 1921 1925
#> [16] 1926 1930 1935 1940 1945 1949 1953 1957 1958 1962 1963 1965 1968 1972 1974
#> [31] 1979 1980 1984 1988 1993 1997 2000 2004 2006 2008 2011 2015 2019
election_provinces()
#>  [1] "Yukon"                     "Northwest Territories"    
#>  [3] "Nunavut"                   "Newfoundland and Labrador"
#>  [5] "Nova Scotia"               "Prince Edward Island"     
#>  [7] "New Brunswick"             "Quebec"                   
#>  [9] "Ontario"                   "Manitoba"                 
#> [11] "Saskatchewan"              "Alberta"                  
#> [13] "British Columbia"
